DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect high inspiratory oxygen cerebral tissue oxygenation patient recovery carotid endarterectomy . Two group patient undergo carotid total intravenous anaesthesia receive either 35 % inspired oxygen 100 % oxygen .
DOC.brief_title: Oxygen Concentration Recovery After Carotid Endarterectomy
DOC.detailed_description: High inspire oxygen concentration may reduce brain hypoxia patient undergo carotid endarterectomy total intravenous anaesthesia . However , study suggest high inspire oxygen concentration may induce cerebral vasoconstriction . This study perform measure influence fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO2 ) regional tissue oxygenation patient undergo carotid endarterectomy total intravenous anaesthesia . The INVOS 5100B monitor use regional cerebral oxygen saturation ( rSO2 ) measurement operative nonoperative side , INVOS Analytics Tool ( Covidien ) area curve ( AUC ) calculation . A bispectral index invasive blood pressure monitoring use patient .
DOC.criteria: patient undergo surgery ( carotid endarterectomy ) decompensated uncontrolled respiratory cardiac disease , myocardial infarction suffer last 6 month , cerebrovascular infarction , coagulopathy , anaphylaxis drug
